name: Patric Oscar Reutersvärd
obverse: Bust of Patric Oscar Reutersvärd facing left.
reverse: An inscription in 11 lines. Below the inscription are two branches tied by a bow.
reverse_inscriptions: ÄDEL FOSTERLÄNSK FRAMSYNT·OCH·VILJESTARK TROGET·VERKSAM·FÖR·SVERIGES OBEROENDE OCH VÄLSTÅND
description: This medal appears to be made to commemorate the Riksdagen held in 1900.
